metadata.title: CVE-2022-31624 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: MariaDB Server before 10.7 is vulnerable to Denial of Service. While executing the plugin/server_audit/server_audit.c method log_statement_ex, the held lock lock_bigbuffer is not released correctly, which allows local users to trigger a denial of service due to the deadlock.

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.5 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
